column5: This is one of the hardest things I have to do. I am looking for a home for my 7yr old Yellow Labrador retriever. His name is Magnum. He's been fixed. CKC registered with papers. He's great  with kids of all ages. Loves to swim and chase sticks and balls. He's more of a couch dog than anything else. Anyone from this site who's fished with me knows he's an awesome boat companion.  He is free to a good home with all the necessary gear. Send me a pm if you are interested and I'll send a picture.  Thanks

Good luck with a wonderful  home for him Jef. Gotta be hard...and I'm so tempted with all this land for him to run around on, but we've got use to our independance over the last year.... of coming and going without having to worry about a dog like we'd done for a decade and a half.
Yeah definitely a tough thing to do..  p.m sent
I'm sorry things have come to this TEP, I hope you manage to find a good home for him.  Maureen
I can only imagine the heart ache you are feeling right now. Good luck on finding that good home for him!
I am sorry you and your buddy have to split thanks for taking the time to find him a great home.   Art
Jef, That sucks for sure brother...Magnum is an awesome dog and a wicked boating companion.  I am sure you will find someone that will give him a loving home.  Gerritt.
PM'd you bud.  I hope all is well.
I hope you find a good home for him Jef.  Jim
What a shame, Jeff.  Good luck on your quest.
I wish I could take him.  Even though he would get to play outside every night and all weekend, I live in an apt. and don't think it would be fair.  Good luck to you (and Magnum).
Bump
What about skud? Kids and lots of lov,n .????????????  I would in a heart beat,but condo living is no place for a great dog like that.
Somebody help this guy out, before I lose my mind and make an offer...  Maureen
PM sent
Easy Maureen...you add any more to the zoo and we may lose our sitter...LOL

Gosh I'd love too, but my cat has about another year and he'd be pretty ticked off with me making his golden years miserable.  Good luck in your search hon, it must be very hard on you and your family.  Joey

Hi. I'm new and I'm a huge dog lover. I know how hard it is to lose your pet whatever the circumstances. So sorry. If it makes you feel any better it definitely sounds like Magnum is a happy dog who has been well loved by you and your family.  I may know someone who would be interested. Would you mind me asking why you are needing to find a new home for Magnum? My friend will ask  so i would like to know before i approach her about adopting him.  She has adopted many dogs of all ages over the years and lost one just a few months ago. She may be open to welcoming a new family member .
Have you found someone yet?  Mark
Good luck Jeff...  If i remember correcty hes a great dog!!
Hey buddy, sent u a PM.

Wow!  Thats hard. I have three myself. If anyone knows me I'm fishing with my beagles all the time.  I have a friend whos dog just passed away so maybe he is looking for another. He will have a good home and lots of roomto play.
I had to make the difficult decision to get rid of my pal last year, Molly was getting jealous of the kids, I feel for you!  Tinman
Wow Eastfisher, its cool that they know how to drive the boat like that.  How are they at docking  Joey
